publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1643 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion—That the Parliament agrees— (a) that the timetable for completion of consideration of the Breastfeeding etc. (Scotland) Bill at Stage 1 be extended to 24 September 2004; and (b) that the timetable for completion of consideration of the Emergency Workers (Scotland) Bill at Stage 1 be extended to 1 October 2004. Supported by: Tavish Scott*
